description: spiral bound booklet with painted design on clear plastic cover and white sheet beneath; photocopied drawings inside; one loose sheet with colorful watercolor forms with text and collage; printed square gallery postcard; printed gallery booklet; multiple gallery artist CV's stapled together with hand-written note; all contained in plastic sleeve; lender's archive #83
provenance: William P. Kosmas, London, England (d. 2017); Estate of William P. Kosmas, Minneapolis; given to MIA, 2018.
title: Bonne Anneé/Happy New Year booklet
